body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race are trained from birth in swordplay, and as a result are automatically proficient with swordlike weapons (including bastard swords, daggers, elven curve blades, falchions, greatswords, kukris, longswords, punching daggers, rapiers, scimitars, short swords, and two-bladed swords).
name: Swordtrained
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Offense Racial Traits/Advanced Traits/Swordtrained
